Articles.Content: So I was attempting an orbital dock, using lander legs. when i circumcised my orbit to intercept and got within 1.1 km of the target...it disappeared. I checked the map and its orbit had been completely replaced by my green one, whereas before you could still see its grey orbit. Check via tabbing and confirmed it disappearance. :-[ Anyone else had this? I don\'t remember ever seeing this bug before.

when i circumcised my orbit

OMG I LAUGHED SO HARD.
lmao, damn typos, also I got another bug, when I get close to the target and use my rcs..it also activates rcs and twirls about to and fro.
Yes, I\'ve had stuff completely disappear for no apparent reason.
Does anyone know a solution to this rcs problem? it makes navigating to it even harder as i have to hold the trans key and double tap R so the target wont have enough time to freak out
Apparently that\'s a Mech Jeb issue, you control all Mech Jebs within a radius.
